Description: Rim and neck sherd of Milesian Fikellura pottery amphora; glaze fired red-brown; top of rim and interior glazed; band on inside of neck below; exterior slipped white; on rim, band of vertical strokes with band below overlapping junction with neck; at top of neck, dividing band of short vertical strokes; meander with dot pattern; two ancient repair holes.
Curator's comments: Compare sherd with British Museum 1861,0425.47 (from Camiros), dated about 540 BC (CVA BM 8, pl. 12, 1).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GF.083)
